heroHeadline: Aegus Homes - Quality Developments in Almeria & Costa Blanca
heroIntro: Aegus Homes has established itself as a significant developer in southeastern Spain, with a focused portfolio of 5 developments featuring 19 properties. Their projects span from the golf resort community of Almerimar to the beach areas of Playa de la Almadrava, offering buyers diverse options in prime locations.

aboutSection.title: About Aegus Homes
aboutSection.content: Aegus Homes concentrates their development activity in carefully selected locations across Almeria and the northern Costa Blanca. Their approach emphasizes quality over quantity, with each development designed to maximize the appeal of its specific location - whether that's proximity to championship golf courses or Mediterranean beaches.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: Aegus Homes has carved out a niche in the Almerimar area, known for its world-class golf facilities and marina. Their developments here cater to golf enthusiasts and sailing aficionados alike. Additionally, their projects near Playa de la Almadrava tap into demand for beachfront living in less crowded areas of the coast.

qualitySection.title: Build Quality
qualitySection.content: Aegus Homes developments are characterized by modern design principles and attention to detail. Properties typically feature open-plan living spaces, quality kitchen installations, and outdoor areas designed to make the most of the Spanish climate.

reasons.title: Strategic Locations
reasons.description: Developments positioned near golf courses, marinas, and beaches.

reasons.title: Quality Focus
reasons.description: Concentrated portfolio allows for attention to detail in each project.

reasons.title: Diverse Options
reasons.description: Properties ranging from apartments to villas across multiple price points.

faqs.question: Where does Aegus Homes build?
faqs.answer: Aegus Homes focuses on Almerimar (Costa de Almeria), Playa de la Almadrava, and San Agustin, with properties also available near Alfaz del Pi on the Costa Blanca.

faqs.question: What amenities are included in Aegus Homes developments?
faqs.answer: Most developments feature communal swimming pools, landscaped gardens, and secure parking. Individual properties include private terraces or gardens.

faqs.question: Are Aegus Homes properties suitable for golf lovers?
faqs.answer: Yes, their Almerimar developments are ideally located for golf enthusiasts, with direct access to championship courses in the area.

conclusion: Aegus Homes offers a curated selection of new build properties in sought-after locations across Almeria and Costa Blanca. Their focus on quality and location makes them an excellent choice for buyers seeking Spanish property in established resort areas.
